Protocols/PBBAPopupViewControllerDelegat.name: -pbbaPopupViewControllerRetryPaymentRequest:
Protocols/PBBAPopupViewControllerDelegat.abstract: The error popup might ask delegate to retry payment request.

Protocols/PBBAPopupViewControllerDelegat.name: -pbbaPopupViewControllerDidExpire:
Protocols/PBBAPopupViewControllerDelegat.abstract: Inform delegate that popup expired. (expiry interval is 0)

Protocols/PBBAPopupViewControllerDelegat.name: -pbbaPopupViewControllerDidCloseByUser:
Protocols/PBBAPopupViewControllerDelegat.abstract: Inform delegate that user has decided to close the popup by pressing the close button.

Protocols/PBBAPopupViewControllerDelegat.name: -pbbaPopupViewControllerWillAppear:
Protocols/PBBAPopupViewControllerDelegat.abstract: Inform delegate that PBBAPopupViewController will appear on the screen.

Protocols/PBBAPopupViewControllerDelegat.name: -pbbaPopupViewControllerDidAppear:
Protocols/PBBAPopupViewControllerDelegat.abstract: Inform delegate that PBBAPopupViewController did appear on the screen.

Protocols/PBBAPopupViewControllerDelegat.name: -pbbaPopupViewControllerWillDisappear:
Protocols/PBBAPopupViewControllerDelegat.abstract: Inform delegate that PBBAPopupViewController will disappear from the screen.

Protocols/PBBAPopupViewControllerDelegat.name: -pbbaPopupViewControllerDidDisappear:
Protocols/PBBAPopupViewControllerDelegat.abstract: Inform delegate that PBBAPopupViewController did disappear from the screen.
